Key Match Events: South Africa beat India by 5 wickets
Lungi Ngidi took 4 wickets for 29 runs and was awarded the player of the match
Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs in 40 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Temba Bavuma denied that South Africa are among the favourites for the T20 World Cup
Rohit Sharma expressed disappointment with India's fielding performance
Others: India scored only 1 run off the first 9 balls they faced
Aiden Markram and David Miller scored half-centuries in South Africa's chase
